title: GP400: The "Elasticity" of Meaning
description: GP400: The "Elasticity" of Meaning. Source: Plan/CIM/IngestedRoadmaps/Corrections.agda. Category: IngestedGP. Tags: GP. Affects: Implementation.agda
intent: | Elasticity: separate tension (internal stress) from resonance (external alignment) and classify edges into the four elasticity quadrants described in GP400. | Addition on natural numbers.
acceptance: All Agda modules compile without errors
